name: kafka-connect-file-pulse
title: Kafka Connect File Pulse
description: The Kafka Connect FilePulse Connector is a powerful source connector that makes it easy to parse, transform, and load data from the local file system into Apache Kafka. It offers built-in support for various file formats such as CSV, XML, JSON, LOG4J, AVRO.

support.summary: This connector is supported by the open source community and StreamThoughts as part of its open source offering.
